seo.title: Monterosso Beaches 2025 | Only Sandy Beaches in Cinque Terre
seo.description: Discover beaches in Monterosso. The only sandy beaches in Cinque Terre. Free areas and beach clubs with services.

body.title: Beaches in Monterosso
body.subtitle: The only sandy beaches in all of Cinque Terre. Crystal-clear water, beach clubs, and free public areas.

features.title: Fegina Beach
features.description: Main beach in new town. Mix of free and paid sections with services.

features.title: Beach Clubs
features.description: Rent sunbeds and umbrellas. Restaurant service available.

features.title: Free Beaches
features.description: Public areas between the paid sections. Bring your own gear.

features.title: Old Town Beach
features.description: Smaller beach near the harbor. More rocky but atmospheric.

features.title: Swimming
features.description: Clear water, gentle waves. Perfect for families.

features.title: Water Sports
features.description: Kayak and paddleboard rental available in summer.
